programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Jared Flitcroft is a filmmaker, businessman, family man, and he is Deaf. Overcoming barriers to achieve success in the film industry, Jared hopes for a future with NZSL used more widely.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Eighteen year old OJ lost his sister to Cystic Fibrosis ; a genetic lung condition he has also inherited. Every breath is a challenge for OJ, but with whanau support he's making each one count.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Awakeners
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) Indigenous singer Laura Vinson shares her heart and personal queries that led her on a quest to find Indigenous artists who are disabled.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kiesha's Story
programme.desc:
Follow Kiesha, who is a vibrant 24-year-old incomplete quadriplegic focused on regaining her strength and retraining her muscle memory as she empowers herself to access health care services in Alberta.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP34) C'est le retour de la campagne Quartiers accessibles de la Fondation INCA. Nous prendrons également des nouvelles de l'Association québécoise des personnes de petite taille.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We take to the ice with Kelly Serbu, captain of the Canadian National Blind Hockey team, to learn what makes him tick at the rink and in the courtroom. Plus, Greg Westlake learns about ParaSport TV live stream.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Mind Set Go
programme.desc:
A serious car accident during pregnancy, coupled with a back injury and postpartum depression, has led Danielle to weight gain. She fights off depression and family pressure with sugary treats.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We take to the ice with Kelly Serbu, captain of the Canadian National Blind Hockey team, to learn what makes him tick at the rink and in the courtroom. Plus, Greg Westlake learns about ParaSport TV live stream.
Année : 2011

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP08) In this episode: Community counts. An active senior citizen starts to doubt his capabilities and worth when his vision slips.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP35) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we are joined by Dawn Pickering, who describes her experiences raising a child who is blind. We discuss the challenges, lessons learned and support available for parents.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) In this episode of Disrupt, hosted by Taylor Olson, we introduce you to drag artists, an artist who is Deaf, a poet and a musician.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Best of Now With Dave Brown
programme.desc:
(S04EP17) Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, entertainment, sports and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
The Tetra Society's focus is to find solutions to overcome environmental barriers faced by people with disabilities, including sex toys. In this episode, we'll follow each step of a request being fulfilled.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) You'll be hooked after you try Halifax-based Instagram food influencer Andy Hay's fish tacos with mango slaw, paired with a mocktail Margarita. It's an East Coast food fiesta you won't want to miss.
Année : 2023

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Go north, young man! Alex Smyth heeds that advice and travels to where Canada's history started: Northern Ontario. Alex explores Moosonee and Moose Factory, where the Hudson Bay Company established their first fur trading post.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Coroner
programme.desc:

programme.title: Le fardeau de la preuve
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) A fish out of water in a town that's as foreign as it is familiar, Joanna must reckon with questions over her family's hasty departure when she was a teenager, while attempting to convince the locals that she has in fact switched sides.
Année : 2019

programme.title: Frankie Drake: détective privée
programme.desc:

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:

programme.desc:
